## types package

<h2> Purpose of this library </h2>

`@mono/types` exists to have all the type information we need for our app

## Remarks

Stay tunned for more info about the decisions we make here

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isTypedArray(array, check)](./types.istypedarray.md) | Check whether an argument is an array where each member is of the specified type |
